content: I'm thinking of getting a new set of wheels and tires for my 2018 Ford Mustang GT. I've been looking at some lightweight wheels with high-performance tires, but I'm not sure what would be the best fit for my car. Do you have any recommendations? By the way, I drove my car at the "Turbocharged Tuesdays" event at the local racing track on June 14th, where I managed to achieve a personal best time of 12.8 seconds in the quarter-mile drag race.
